attributes.action: Jobseekers Allowance Should Be Earned By A Form Of Community Service
attributes.additional_details:
Members of the public that claim benifits because they are out of work, (excluding members of the public that are incapable of  working due to illness etc) eg Jobseekers should have to earn there benifit by doing community work eg cleaning parks and doing chartiable work for charties etc.
This should only apply to people that have been out of work for over three months, the three months allows people to find work before falling into this bracket and would potentially reduce the total benifits the government pay out.
